lead_paragraph: Investigators believe Manuel Israel robbed five women of Chinese descent and tried to rob a sixth.

headline.print_headline: Man, 20, Faces Hate Crime Charges in Robberies
headline.main: Man, 20, Faces Hate Crime Charges in Brooklyn Robberies

snippet: Investigators believe Manuel Israel robbed five women of Chinese descent and tried to rob a sixth.
abstract: Manhattan man Manuel Israel is charged on 36 counts, including robbery as a hate crime, for attacking and robbing six women of Chinese descent in Brooklyn's Borough Park neighborhood.
